short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide Puretech motors from car listing on La Centrale, AramisAuto and LeBonCoin

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
